Sentencas: The development of novel ceramic materials, which can be used as components in the various electrochemical devices, is actively in progress.
Titulo: Novel mixed oxygen-electronic conductors based on BaLa2In2O7 with two-layer Ruddlesden-Popper structure

Sentencas: The dynamic search for ionic conductors beyond traditional perovskite/fluorite structural types is one of possible means for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Novel mixed oxygen-electronic conductors based on BaLa2In2O7 with two-layer Ruddlesden-Popper structure

Sentencas: In this study we focus on a novel ceramic material with significantly improved properties for the electrochemical purposes.
Titulo: Novel mixed oxygen-electronic conductors based on BaLa2In2O7 with two-layer Ruddlesden-Popper structure

Sentencas: The possibility of acceptor (Ca2+ -> La3+) and donor (Ti4+ -> In3+) doping of layered perovskite BaLa2In2O7 was proved for the first time.
Titulo: Novel mixed oxygen-electronic conductors based on BaLa2In2O7 with two-layer Ruddlesden-Popper structure

Sentencas: It was showed that both types of doping lead to the increase in the share of oxygen-ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Novel mixed oxygen-electronic conductors based on BaLa2In2O7 with two-layer Ruddlesden-Popper structure

Sentencas: Acceptor (calcium) doping leads to the increase in the conductivity values up to similar to 0.6 order of magnitude.
Titulo: Novel mixed oxygen-electronic conductors based on BaLa2In2O7 with two-layer Ruddlesden-Popper structure

Sentencas: This work opens up a new way in the design of oxygen-ionic conductors with double-layered perovskite structure.
Titulo: Novel mixed oxygen-electronic conductors based on BaLa2In2O7 with two-layer Ruddlesden-Popper structure
